name: Tales of a Whispering Song
description:
Once upon a time in the 16th Christmas, in Christmas village, the Christmas tree was dying. A thick darkness was covering the village and all hope seemed to be lost. Only one little brave elf is in charge of carry the Christmas Tree’s seed that can enlighten the world again and save the Christmas village. Help our little friend to carry the seed and plant the new tree, don’t let the darkness take over the world, making it sad and gray.

Play the bells in the way to unlock new platforms and also drive away the darkness to gain time.

Play the bells and pull the levers with Z and jump with X on your keyboard.

Good luck in your journey and hurry!
